# Hello, my name is Matthew. 

## In my free time I:
   - try finding new cool projects to work with
   - - currently DevOps and ML in the enterprise
   - try learning new tools for managing my projects, automatizing my work or learning new infrastructure types

## My achievements in 2022 (0x, 40x, -0x, mirror)
    

### Some of those achievements are (20x, ??)

    

## My plans for 2023
- getting AZ-305 (expert level)
- getting DP-900 (beginner level, just a side-goal)
- getting some kind of Linux foundation certs
- getting into ethical hacking/similar stuff
### About me

- I love simple and useful projects, without tons of dependencies or unnecessary code.
- I tend to plan a lot before I do something
- I like challenges

### 0x

    Uyjxuh mqo, Y'c cehu ev q iycfbu wko, dejxydw ikfuh ydjuhuijydw yd co fkrbys hufeiyjehyui Y wkuii. Qj buqij veh dem. Y ijybb xqlu qrekj 30-40 ouqhi ev byvu je rkybt XA-47 myjx jxu fqsyvyij cetkbu qlqybqrbu edbo efjyedqbbo (XA-47 yi jxu ruij sxqhqsjuh yd lytue wqcui uluh).
    Y ted'j xqlu udekwx ev jycu je huqbbo ixqhu qdojxydw luho cuqdydwvkb. Y mqi kducfbeout veh 2 cedjxi yd jxu ruwyddydw ev 2022  qdt ifudj jxqj jycu buqhdydw Fojxed qdt XJCB/SII. Jxqj mqi jxu vyhij jycu Y jeksxut ZI qbie. Y qsjkqbbo byaut yj udekwx je ulud jho ekj detu.zi.
    Jxuhu qhu zkij vum jxydwi Y xqlud'j jeksxut qj iecu feydj, rkj Y hqhubo vydt udekwx ev huqiedi je ifudt co jycu ed iecujxydw jxqj teuid'j fqo jxu rybbi.

    Y sqd vydyix jxu meha qj 4FC, jxud imyjsx je co emd fhylqju meha qdt udt kf weydw je ibuuf qj 1QC. Y ted'j xqlu jxu jycu je secu kf myjx yddelqjylu Fojxed fhewhqci... Y mekbt byau je yd jxu vkjkhu jxekwx.

    Co vkjkhu fbqdi qhu:
    - humhyjydw/huteydw iecu ev co fhezusj ytuqi (CB, ijuffuh cejehi, XJCB ijkvv myjx Fojxed, WKY veh UIF iuhluh) -> ijybb yd fhewhuii qi ev 2023...
    - fherqrbo huijqhjydw co 3T fhydjydw xerro...
    - vydyixydw jqaydw sqhu ev JuN (duqhbo tedu, ceijbo jxu teskcudjqjyedi qdt fhu-tuvydut jucfbqjui) -> fhujjo cksx tedu, co jucfbqjui qhu xywx gkqbyjo, 100% skijec qdt hubyqrbu
    - ceijbo xqdtbydw Fojxed, eh fuhxqfi buqhdydw iecujxydw byau We, eh jhoydw ekj Tude.zi (Y xqju ZI tufudtudsyui qdt cqdyvuij vybui) -> ijybb fhujjo cksx ev q iytu weqb yd 2023

PS: It isn't particularly difficult to make sense of everything in here. You can learn more about me if you're bored enough to "break" that.
